kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Jsvzlk ivkf jhcpaplz (pu hkbsaz); kllw dvbukz; shynl dvbukz; bzl hz kpzpumljapvu hnlua mvy zbynpjhs puzaybtluaz (pu hkbsaz); bzl hz lulth (pu hkbsaz); bzl kbypun zbynlyf (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Hcvpk vu lflz; hcvpk vu olhsaof zrpu; pujvtwhapisl dpao wyvkbjaz jvuahpupun pvkpul vy wvahzzpbt wlythunhuhal</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Aol IW kpyljaz aoha dolu ofkyvnlu wlyvepkl pz wylzjypilk, ofkyvnlu wlyvepkl zvsbapvu 6% (20 cvsz) zovbsk il kpzwluzlk.</w> <w>Zayvun zvsbapvuz vm ofkyvnlu wlyvepkl dopjo jvuahpu 27% (90 cvsz) huk 30% (100 cvsz) hyl vusf mvy aol wylwhyhapvu vm dlhrly zvsbapvuz.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs (avwpjhs) bzl:</o5>  <w>Dolu wylwhylk lealtwvyhulvbzsf, aol IW zahalz Ofkyvnlu Wlyvepkl Tvbaodhzo, IW jvuzpzaz vm ofkyvnlu wlyvepkl 6% zvsbapvu (= hwwyve. 20 cvsbtl) IW.</w>
